title: Advertising Metrics
description: Quantifiable measures used to track and assess the status of a advertising business process.

xdm:impressions.title: Impressions
xdm:impressions.description: Number of impressions of an advertisement.

xdm:clicks.title: Clicks
xdm:clicks.description: Number of clicks of an advertisement.
